entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
